WorkItem.Description: It seems that the Scryer Procc on the Shattered Sun Pendant of Might is being modeled as +4.35 weapon damage.  Is this correct?  +Weapon damage scales with haste, as far as I have seen, this neck has a 45 second internal cooldown that leads to ~1ppm.  Doing ~350 damage per procc.
WorkItem.Summary: SS Pendant of Might modeled as +weapon damage?

Comments.Message: The weapon damage approximation in b13.1 is reasonably accurate. Not perfect, but it's close (and yes, this proc scales with haste). In b14, we've got a very accurate calculation for it.
